Title: Day 6: 12:00 P.M. - 1:00 P.M.
Plot: Jack's family loyalties are put to the test as Graem reveals his full involvement in the terrorist activities. Wayne convenes a meeting of his cabinet to discuss Lennox's drastic policies, while Sandra tends to an injured Walid. Morris receives some bad news about a relative, and McCarthy sets a trap designed to capture the man who can help Fayed build a new trigger for the nukes.
GuestStars: Robb Weller,  James C. Victor,  Martin A. Papazian,  Missy Crider,  David Hunt,  Paul McCrane,  James Cromwell
